Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.10673369]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=1.7 μM in low-salt; MIC=0.7 μM in high-salt), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=0.3 μM in low-salt; MIC=0.4 μM in high-salt), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=1.4 μM in low-salt; MIC=1.2 μM in high-salt);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=6.1 μM in low-salt; MIC=1.2 μM in high-salt), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=2.0 μM in low-salt; MIC=4.7 μM in high-salt), Primula vulgaris (MIC=17.0 μM in low-salt; MIC=39.8 μM in high-salt), Klebsiella oxytoca (MIC=4.1 μM in low-salt; MIC=4.1 μM in high-salt);Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=10.5 μM in low-salt; MIC=5.2 μM in high-salt), Candida kefyr (MIC=1.1 μM in low-salt; MIC=0.7 μM in high-salt), Candida tropicalis (MIC=2.3 μM in low-salt; MIC=1.9 μM in high-salt).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.10673369] EC25=3900 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria, Gram-negative bacteria and fungi. Has hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Marked increase in membranolytic selectivity of novel cyclic tachyplesins constrained with an antiparallel two-beta strand cystine knot framework.
Literature.Author: Tam JP, Lu YA, Yang JL.
